directions: Combine first 6 ingredients in large bowl. Whisk lime juice, honey, and oil in small bowl to blend. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Pour dressing over fruit mixture; toss gently to coat. Divide salad among 6 plates. Sprinkle with sunflower seeds and serve.
ingredients: 8 ounces apricots or nectarines, halved, pitted, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
1 1-pint basket strawberries, hulled, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
title: Apricot, Berry, and Jícama Salad with Honey-Lime Dressing
